description: An animated series created to celebrate 25 years of the global entertainment franchise. Each episode will take fans on a journey through all the known regions of the Pokémon world.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Proxy Battle
tags.description: A proxy battle is a battle where humans use creatures/robots to do the fighting for them, either by commanding those creatures/robots or by simply evolving them/changing them into battle mode.

tags.name: Creature Taming
tags.description: Features the taming of animals, monsters, or other creatures.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

name.native: ゲーチス・ハルモニア

node.description: She was cast as the Hexenkönigin (witch queen) and Mimi in the German DoReMi.Jahrgang She was born in 1956. She is 165 cm tall, has brown-blonde hair, and green-blue eyes. She can speak English and French as well as German. She plays the guitar and the flute. She is currently living in München.

She was cast as the Hexenkönigin (witch queen) and Mimi in the German DoReMi.Jahrgang She was born in 1956. She is 165 cm tall, has brown-blonde hair, and green-blue eyes. She can speak English and French as well as German. She plays the guitar and the flute. She is currently living in München.

Originating from Studio Cockpit, currently affiliated with [ufotable](https://anilist.co/studio/43/). 

_Note: Not to be confused with the [other animator](https://anilist.co/staff/134294/)._

[Twitter](https://x.com/YusukeOshida)

Currently an employee for studio [OLM](https://anilist.co/studio/28/OLM). Originating from studio [ZEXCS](https://anilist.co/studio/218/ZEXCS).

Has deep respect for fellow Pokémon animators [Masaaki Iwane](https://anilist.co/staff/112799/Masaaki-Iwane), [Aito Oohashi](https://anilist.co/staff/149302/Aito-Oohashi) and [Takeshi Maenami](https://anilist.co/staff/172088/Takeshi-Maenami).

Ever since being a child the Pokémon series inspired a dream in him of wanting to become an animator. In order to achieve his dream he started working for studio Zexcs in 2017, where he first did analog in-between animation for about a year, after which he did 2nd key animation for a little over a year. 

From around January of his second year he started doing key animation, after which he worked for studio Zexcs for about 4 years in total between 2017 to 2021. During this time he would debut as a key animator in the anime [Shadowverse](https://anilist.co/anime/112325/Shadowverse/). After getting lucky enough to work on [Pocket Monster (2019)](https://anilist.co/anime/112153/Pocket-Monsters-2019/) and [Pokémon Evolutions](https://anilist.co/anime/138699/Pokmon-Evolutions/) in 2021, he made the shift from studio Zexcs to studio OLM around the new year of 2022 to further pursue his dream of animating for the Pokémon series.
**Hiromi Sakai** is an animation director and animator.
Formerly affiliated with [OLM](https://anilist.co/studio/28/OLM), now affiliated with ARED.

title.native: ポケモンジェネレーションズ
ポケットモンスター THE ORIGIN
